name: emTransit B.V.
goal: Vibrant inner cities, free of cars and pollution. This is an ideal we can all get behind. And we at Dott believe we can make that happen, by offering our dockless, shared electrical scooters and bikes as alternatives for short-distance travel.
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Fraud prevention, Research and innovation, Single market, Sport, Taxation, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Road safety, Motor Insurance Directive, Personal light electric vehicles (PLEV) standardisation, DATA
